name: Prusa Generic PLA @MINIIS
filament_start_gcode:
; filament start gcode
M900 K{if printer_notes=~/.*PRINTER_MODEL_MINIIS.*/ and nozzle_diameter[0]==0.6}0.12{elsif printer_notes=~/.*PRINTER_MODEL_MINIIS.*/ and nozzle_diameter[0]==0.8}0.06{elsif printer_notes=~/.*PRINTER_MODEL_MINIIS.*/}0.2{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.8}0.01{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.6}0.04{else}0.05{endif} ; Filament gcode LA 1.5
{if printer_notes=~/.*PRINTER_MODEL_MINIIS.*/};{elsif printer_notes=~/.*PRINTER_HAS_BOWDEN.*/}M900 K200{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.6}M900 K18{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.8};{else}M900 K30{endif} ; Filament gcode LA 1.0 

M572 S{if nozzle_diameter[0]==0.6}0.17{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.8}0.12{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.4}0.27{elsif nozzle_diameter[0]==0.25}0.85{else}0{endif}
